original_title: Marching On: The Story of Bishop Richard Mickley
overview: Marching On tells the story of Bishop Richard Mickley who is one of the organizers of the first pride march in the Philippines which is also the first in Asia. The film reflects on the early days of the LGBTQI+ advocacy in the country and the continuous fight of the Filipino LGBTQI+ community for acceptance and equality.
title: Marching On: The Story of Bishop Richard Mickley
